page.title: 15HOUSING STRACATHRO
page.content: {Inchbare village and surroundings: There are{four houses belonging to {Angus District Council. Some four or five houses are rented from a local owner, by{naval personell {from the R.A.F.Edzell U.S. Base. All the other houses in the village are{owner-occupied. In summer, the gardens of the village are noted for their beauty and colour, and people come from far and wide to photograph them. Many of the{cottages on the {surrounding farms are now rented by {people who have no connection with {agriculture. The former{Station House}has been converted into a beautiful home since {the railway line which linked the {parish with Brechin, Forfar, Glasgow {and London is now gone}and the{nearest {railway station is at Montrose.
